text:
1. Call letters and location of radio station.
2. Does your station carry any network or transcription programs devoted to
home economics or domestic science? _If so, please list them. _
3. Does your station have its own local home economics commentator or domestic
science expert?_ If so, please state her name.__
4. How many times a week does this commentator or expert broadcast? _
5. Is this commentator or expert heard on sustaining programs? _
6. Does your commentator or expert broadcast on any commercial programs? _
If so, please state the name of the sponsor or sponsors. __
COMMENTS:
